metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8019 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The skb_copy_and_csum_datagram_iovec function in net/core/datagram.c in theLinux kernel 3.14.54 and 3.18.22 does not accept a length argument, whichallows local users to cause a denial of service (memory corruption) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a write system call followed bya recvmsg system call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19

No subscription required
